div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 42 Euboea (or Boeotia), 1951 Burial: c. 400 B.C. Contents: c. 350 AR Tanagra:1 st. Thebes: 68-70 st. (some ctmk. on shield) Euboean League: 30 st. Athens: 2 tetradr. Sicyon: 1 st. Disposition: unknown Wallace, NNM 134 (1956), pp. 49-50, no. 3, 137-9, some illus.
